document_data.name: Regbald Stonethrower
document_data.mainbody: '''Regbald Stonethrower''' was a [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[warrior]] of the [[Frozenfar]] around [[1369 DR]].
document_data.History: In [[Tarsakh]], [[1369 DR]], while traveling through the [[Spine of the World]] pass into [[Icewind Dale]] Regbald was killed fighting [[hobgoblin]] raiders and their [[goblin]] scouts who ambushed merchant caravans.
